channel.title: Designing Websites
channel.description:
I'll design you a sleek, original website (HTML only) using Photoshop and Dream weaver. I will design it exactly to the purpose of the site and make sure it is user friendly. If necessary, I can help install PHP scripts on your web host and integrate them into the design.
EDIT: As templates cannot be sold here, I will have to offer this service over MSN or other means of communication, So if you need a website designed add me: dunnstefan@gmail.com
For more information, please feel free to post here or give me a PM.
Thank You.

item.title: Designing Websites
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Umm, Doesn’t he charge for that? So you would have to talk to him on MSN to be able to get one.

Read full topic

item.description:

http://templates.thestilleffect.com/Distant%20Illusion2/

EDIT: Mind, the templates hosted on my subdomain are not expected to work as they are discontinued websites.
